title: [Extension Proposal] Statiq an extension to generate static pages from your Quarkus web-app

labels.name: area/quarkiverse
labels.description: This issue/PR is part of the Quarkiverse organization

body:
### Description

- has a configuration to describe what to generate
- provides a endpoint to generate on the server fs (or dl as a tar.gz)
- provides a CLI command to generate on the fs

### Repository name

quarkus-statiq

### Short description

An extension to generate/publish static pages from your Quarkus web-app

### Repository Homepage URL

https://quarkiverse.github.io/quarkiverse-docs/quarkus-statiq/dev/

### Repository Topics

- quarkus-extension
- web
- static
- generate
- blog



### Team Members

- ia3andy


### Additional context

_No response_
